summary: An Ordinance transferring the sum of Eleven and 07/100 ($11.07) Dollars from Local Improvement District No. 321, to Local Improvement District No. 331, for the purpose of reimbursing the latter district on account of Warrant No. 13051, which was issued on January 30, 1908, for Eleven and 07/100 ($11.07) Dollars to Walter Eyers, under authority of Ordinance No. 13824, as a refund of excess assessments paid into local improvement district No. 321, and issued in error on Local Improvement District No. 331.
